promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi cute legendary monkey normal-type pokemon holding a ornate bow. It can be found in field-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, normal or monkey. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Bowtodo, a a chibi cute legendary monkey normal-type pokemon. It can be found in field-like environments It has the following abilities: Mach Cyclone, Double Thread. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "monkey", "normal" or "Bowtodo". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of normal-type pokemon, monkey-like, legendary, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, bright lighting
generatedDescription: Bowtodo, the woodland sprite of legend. With Mach Cyclone & Double Thread, it controls wind to weave tales in fields.
